Package org.ginsim.service.tool.avatar.simulation

Class MDDUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ginsim.service.tool.avatar.simulation.MDDUtils
  • public final class MDDUtils
extends Object
    Facilities associated with simulation services. Including:
    1) Random generation of an initial state from a given pattern or state-set.
    2) Inference of state patterns from a given set of states.
    3) Generating a drawable graph from a complex attractor.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Rui Henriques

      • toStateSet

        public static StateSet toStateSet​(List<byte[]> oracle,
                                  List<org.colomoto.biolqm.NodeInfo> nodes)
        Maps an oracle (set of state patterns) into a set of specific states
        Parameters:
        oracle - the oracle (set of state patterns) to be unfolded
        nodes - knowledge of the states of the components within a state pattern
        Returns:
        the set of specific states associated with the given state patterns

      • getStates

        public static List<byte[]> getStates​(NamedStatesHandler states,
                                     List<org.colomoto.biolqm.NodeInfo> nodes)
        Returns a list of states given a handler for NamedStates and the ordered set of components
        Parameters:
        states - states handler containing a named list of normal and input states
        nodes - list of components
        Returns:
        the list of states represented as byte arrays from the inputted handler

      • getStatePatterns

        public static List<byte[]> getStatePatterns​(List<org.colomoto.biolqm.NodeInfo> vars,
                                            AbstractStateSet stateset)
        Infers a set of state patterns from a given set of states
        Parameters:
        vars - list of node info the logical model to facilitate the generation of the MDD for the extraction of pattern
        stateset - the set of states to be compacted
        Returns:
        the set of state patterns associated with the given states
